verses.name: Ruth 4:16
verses.text: And Naomi took the child, and laid it in her bosom, and became nurse unto it.

verses.name: Ruth 4:17
verses.text: And the women her neighbours gave it a name, saying, There is a son born to Naomi; and they called his name Obed: he is the father of Jesse, the father of David.

verses.name: Ruth 4:18
verses.text: Now these are the generations of Pharez: Pharez begat Hezron,

verses.name: Ruth 4:19
verses.text: And Hezron begat Ram, and Ram begat Amminadab,

verses.name: Ruth 4:20
verses.text: And Amminadab begat Nahshon, and Nahshon begat Salmon,

verses.name: Ruth 4:21
verses.text: And Salmon begat Boaz, and Boaz begat Obed,

verses.name: Ruth 4:22
verses.text: And Obed begat Jesse, and Jesse begat David.
